GeekPress is a casual Blogger template for you easy public your small news and magazine projects.

We designed it with flat and responsive feature, and it's very friendly, also easy to work without touch to code. Public a magazine with GeekPress is the easiest way.

We support you free widgets, tools and tips for your blogger blog.
